text:
Normally if you redirect <http://example.com/abc|example.com/abc> to <http://example.com/xyz|example.com/xyz>
when you visit /abc, your browser will go to /xyz and say /xyz in the address bar. If you use proxy you will stay on /abc in the address bar but you will see the page content of /xyz

Hi guys,
I have a table car and a child table car-parts(this table contains a list of car parts for a particular car). as our database grow over time, it become difficult to link the tables manually. My question is: when we create new car is it possible to link the car parts from the child table associated with the new car automatically ? the name of the car and the name of the car pars are the same. that is how we know witch car part is associated with the particular car.  any ideas on how to implement this???
Thanks!
Would <#C2YHAHB6K|api> be the best channel to discuss Custom Code workflow blocks?
thanks i just needed a confirmation that was what was happening.
Hi team! Do you know how to omit / send only some specific properties in a workflow? (to a webhook)

Hello, Our AMS is MemberClicks. This evening I am mapping fields. i.e. In MbrCks the field for adding a member's email is [email | best email]. In HubSpot, there is a field called "email".  Do I create a property  [email | best email] or do I somehow map [email | best email] to "email"?
Hello! excited to join this slack
